scripts.pull-test-tagged: yarn run clear-docs && npx docu-notion-kira -n $DOCU_NOTION_INTEGRATION_TOKEN -r $DOCU_NOTION_SAMPLE_ROOT_PAGE -m ./docs -i ./static/notion_imgs -p /notion_imgs/ --status-tag test
scripts.//pull: This uses the specific version of docu-notion-kira in package-lock.json, not necessarily the latest
scripts.pull: yarn run clear-docs && npx docu-notion-kira -n $DOCU_NOTION_INTEGRATION_TOKEN -r $DOCU_NOTION_SAMPLE_ROOT_PAGE_DOC -i ./static/notion_imgs -p /notion_imgs/ --yes --log-level verbose
scripts.//serve: Needed, for example, to test the search functionality locally
